Federal Register: 160. Methyl isothiocyanate (CAS No. 00556-61-6) (FIFRA AI) (Ref. 3). Aquatic acute toxicity values for methyl isothiocyanate include a fish 96-hour LC sub 50 of 94 ppb, a 96-hour LC sub 50 of 130 ppb for bluegills, and a daphnid 48-hour LC sub 50 of 55 ppb. EPA believes that there is sufficient evidence for listing methyl isothiocyanate on EPCRA section 313 pursuant to EPCRA section 313(d)(2)(C) based on the available environmental toxicity data.
